By Kurasu Soratobu on Wednesday, August 27, 2003 - 11:35 pm:

Considering all the breeding people have had to do to get the purebreed tigers, I think if it was that simple, it would've been seen. So far, no-go, though.

I wondered if it might be an item that we hadn't yet discovered, but with folks poking around the game's inner workings, I think someone would've found said items, even by accident.

My only suggestion is for folks like Jimeous (hint hint?) to do some prodding at the code and see if they can figure it out? Because I know _I_ sure can't. Likewise with the other stuff we've yet to figure out (like Dignity... which I _think_ is a % chance with fighting, but otherwise, no clue)

_That's_ the part I'm wondering about.
